desc.data: ¶= apostrophe¶• glottal stop, glottalization, ejective¶• many languages use this as a letter of their alphabets¶• used as a tone marker in Bodo, Dogri, and Maithili¶• 2019 is the preferred character for a punctuation apostrophe¶→ (apostrophe - 0027)¶→ (combining comma above - 0313)¶→ (combining comma above right - 0315)¶→ (armenian apostrophe - 055A)¶→ (nko high tone apostrophe - 07F4)¶→ (greek psili - 1FBF)¶→ (right single quotation mark - 2019)
